text: bahala spastavada nam'ma vacanagalannu avarige odi kelisaladaga, nam'mannu bhetiyaguva nirikse illadavaru, idara badalige berondu kurâ€Œan annu tanniri athava idannu tiddiri ennuttare. (Dutare,) heliri; nanna iccheyinda idannu tidduva adhikara nanagilla. Nanantu nannedege kalisalagiruva divyavaniyannu matra anusarisuttene. Ondu vele nanu nanna odeyana ajneyannu miri nadedare, ondu mahan dinada sikseya bhaya nanagide
